   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to Slackfin's documentation!
====================================

Slackfin is a Python library providing a set of classes that make it easy
to send complex messages to Slack using only Python.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   api
